title: Passive voice - 2
instructions: Put the sentences into the passive.
exa:
They clean the offices every day.
The offices are cleaned every day.
They will help us.
We will be helped by them.

contents.longsent: They didn't cook  the dinner when I got home.
alters: The dinner wasn't cooked when I got home.
The dinner was not cooked when I got home.

contents.longsent: They will operate on Bill tomorrow.
alters: Bill will be operated on tomorrow.

contents.longsent: I hope they will repair my car next week.
alters: I hope my car will be repaired next week.
